column2: # Hacemos un attach de los datos para que sea más fácil su manejo

The following objects are masked from cardio_clean (pos = 3):

    age, alcohol_intake, blood_pressure, cardiovascular_disease, cholesterol, diastolic_blood_pressure, gender, glucose,
    group_age, group_height, group_imc, group_weight, height, hypertension, imc, physical_activity, smoking,
    systolic_blood_pressure, weight
